angle.headline: Sources: Security Perimeter Expansion for Super Bowl LX
angle.angle: I'm hearing the security perimeter around Levi's Stadium will be significantly larger than ever before, impacting local businesses and traffic flow. Expect road closures and increased security checks.

specific_facts: Confirm the exact radius of the expanded security perimeter (e.g., three-block radius).
Identify specific streets and businesses that will be affected by road closures and security checkpoints.
Detail the types of security checks that will be implemented (e.g., bag searches, metal detectors, vehicle inspections).
Investigate the number of security personnel involved in managing the perimeter.
Determine the cost of implementing the expanded security measures.
Ascertain how the security plan differs from previous Super Bowls or large events at Levi's Stadium.
